title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep. 196 w/ Lil Wayne)
itunes:title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep. 196 w/ Lil Wayne)
description:
Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER - In this edition of The Hangover, N.O.R.E. and Sunny D BET are the only Hangover Crew that lasted!

This week we recap our conversation with the legend, Lil Wayne! Check out as N.O.R.E and Sunny D share some of their favorite moments from this weeks episode!

Follow:

Drink Champs

http://www.instagram.com/drinkchamps

http://www.facebook.com/drinkchamps

N.O.R.E.

http://www.instagram.com/therealnoreaga

http://www.twitter.com/noreaga

Sunny D

http://www.instagram.com/sunnydbet

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
